faq.title: Support Center
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SHUZEBI.

questions.q1: How do I know my size?
questions.a1: We use standard EU sizing for all our sneakers. On every product page, you'll find a detailed size guide. If you're in between sizes, we recommend sizing up for most models.
questions.a2: Yes! We offer free worldwide shipping on all orders over $250. For orders under that amount, a flat rate applies depending on your region.
questions.a3: 100%. Every single pair goes through a rigorous multi-step authentication process by our expert team before it's shipped to you. We have a zero-tolerance policy for fakes.
questions.a4: SHUZEBI was designed and engineered by Luka, a 16-year-old frontend developer. It showcases modern web technologies like React, Framer Motion, and AI integration.
questions.a5: You have 30 days from delivery to return your item. The item must be unworn, with all original tags and packaging intact.

success.title: Order Confirmed!
success.message: Thank you for your purchase. Since this is a portfolio demo, no actual money was charged. You're officially part of the SHUZEBI family.

payment.title: Payment
payment.secureMessage: This is a secure 256-bit SSL encrypted payment. For this demo, no real cards are processed.
